Name: Absurd Chess
About the game: Absurd Chess will introduce you to a set of completely absurd chess rules and variants you've never played before! - Play with friends or alone against up to 100 other players - Explore multiple modes and find your favourite - Adapt to new rules and use them to your advantage Running out of pieces ? How about buying a few more ?
